alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:48PM EST until December 25 at 6:08AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Petersburg. White River at Elliston. White River at Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Youngs Creek at Amity. East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Edwardsport. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. Flooding may persist into Christmas Eve for portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Petersburg. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins to flood several Pike County roads. Many of the following county roads begin to flood around this level...east of SR 57 include CR 750N...CR 600N and CR 1000E. Pike county road subject to flooding west of SR 57 include...CR 250 W...CR 400W...CR 675N...CR 700 N...CR 1000w...CR 900W...CR 700W and CR 775W. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Saturday /6:30 PM CST Saturday/ the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late tonight to 18.3 feet Monday morning. It will then fall to 17.9 feet and begin rising again early Tuesday afternoon. It will rise to 18.5 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Sunday morning by around 1100 AM EST /1000 AM CST/.
